tuv.seg: Seanad - the University Constituency
Seanad - Toghcheantar na nOllscoileanna
The National University of Ireland (NUI) can elect 3 members to the Seanad
Is féidir le Ollscoil na hÉireann (OÉ) triúr a thoghadh don Seanad
The NUI consists of:
Seo a leanas coláistí OÉ:
• National University of Ireland, Galway
• Ollscoil na hÉireann, Gaillimh
• National University of Ireland, Maynooth
• Ollscoil na hÉireannl, Mhá Nuad
The NUI also awards degrees in a number of other colleges
Bronnann OÉ céimeanna i roinnt coláistí eile freisin
The graduates of these "recognised colleges" with NUI awards may also vote in the Seanad elections
Is féidir le céimithe "na gcoláistí aitheanta seo" vóta a chaitheamh i dtoghcháin an tSeanaid chomh maith
The recognised colleges are:
Seo a leanas na coláistí aitheanta:
• Royal College of Surgeons
• Coláiste Ríoga na Máinlianna
• National College of Art and Design
• Coláiste Náisiúnta Ealaíne agus Deartha
• Shannon College of Hotel Management
• Coláiste Bainistíocht Óstáin na Sionainne
There are also formerly recognised colleges
Tá coláistí a raibh aitheantas acu tráth ann freisin
Graduates of these colleges who hold an NUI award may also vote in the Seanad elections
Céimithe de na coláistí seo a bhfuil céim OÉ acu is féidir leo vóta a chaitheamh i dtoghcháin an tSeanaid
Formerly recognised colleges include:
I measc na gcoláistí a raibh aitheantas acu tá:
• St. Patrick's College, Maynooth (now the University of Maynooth)
• Coláiste Naomh Phádraig, Má Nuad (Ollscoil Mhá Nuad anois)
• Our Lady of Mercy College, Carysfort
• Coláiste Naomh Mhuire na Trócaire
• Mary Immaculate College of Education, Limerick (now a college of the University of Limerick)
• Coláiste Naomh Mhuire Gan Smál, Luimneach (atá anois ina choláiste d'Ollscoil Luimnigh)
• St. Patrick's College of Education, Drumcondra (now a college of Dublin City University)
• Coláiste Oideachais Naomh Phádraig, Drom Conrach (atá anois ina choláiste d'Ollscoil Chathair Bhaile Átha Cliath)
• NIHE, Limerick (now the University of Limerick)
• INAO, Luimneach (Ollscoil Luimnigh anois)
• Thomond College of Education, Limerick (now part of the University of Limerick)
• Coláiste Thuaidh Mhumhan, Luimneach (atá anois mar chuid d'Ollscoil Luimnigh)
• St Angela's College of Education, Sligo
• Coláiste Oideachais Naomh Aingeal, Sligeach
A list of the institutions in the NUI Seanad Éireann constituency is available on nui.ie
Tá liosta institiúidí sa toghcheantar Seanaid Éireann ar fáil ar nui.ie
University of Dublin (Trinity College)
Ollscoil Bhaile Átha Cliath (Coláiste na Tríonóide)
The University of Dublin may also elect 3 members of the Seanad
Is féidir le hOllscoile Bhaile Átha Cliath triúr a thoghadh don Seanad
This means that graduates of Trinity College may vote in the election
Mar sin is féidir le céimithe de Choláiste na Tríonóide vóta a chaitheamh sa toghchán
There are also a number of other colleges that award University of Dublin degrees, including the Dublin Institute of Technology
Tá roinnt coláistí eile a bhronnann céimeanna ó Ollscoil Bhaile Átha Cliath, ina measc Institiúid Teicneolaíochta Bhaile Átha Cliath
Graduates of these colleges who hold a University Of Dublin degree may also vote in the Seanad election
Is féidir le céimithe na gcoláistí sin a bhfuil céim acu ó Ollscoil Bhaile Átha Cliath vóta a chaitheamh i dtoghcháin an tSeanaid
